WelcomePage.SubTitle: Ready to get a personal weight loss plan?

story4.text: Lacking motivation? Don't want to go on a strict diet and exhaust yourself with workouts?

story5.text: There is a way out! App Slim$N$Rich!

First.Title: By myself
First.Description: Challenge yourself, set a desired result and strive for it. If you win, take the winnings, if you lose, you lose money

Second.Title: 1 on 1 with friend
Second.Description: Challenge another player and fight him in a fair duel. If you win, take your winnings, if you lose, you lose your money

Third.Description: Challenge another player and fight him in a fair duel. If you win, take your winnings, if you lose, you lose your money

Fifth.Title: Group for time
Fifth.Description: Challenge another player and fight him in a fair duel. If you win, take your winnings, if you lose, you lose your money

Sixth.Title: Group by weight
Sixth.Description: Challenge another player and fight him by weight in a fair duel. In case of victory you take the winnings, in case of loss you lose money

Accrual.Title: Accrual of Slims to the bonus account
Accrual.Text: <title>1. Daily data upload.</title><text>Every day you upload data, you earn extra Slims to your bonus account. Regularity is the key to success: don't miss a single day and collect the maximum amount of Slims in a week!</text><title>2. Weekly participation in battles.</title><text>Compete with your team and other participants every week. Every 10 weeks you will be able to earn the most Slims. Please note that only premium category battles are taken into account.</text><title>3. Inviting friends.</title><text>Every day you upload data, you earn extra Slims to your bonus account. Regularity is the key to success: don't miss a single day and collect the maximum amount of Slims in a week!</text><title>4. Bonus for the activity of invited people.</title><text>Receive 25% of all bonus Slims earned by each friend you invite. So, the more active your friend is, the more Slims will be in your bonus account.</text>

Premium.Title: Premium Subscription Features
Premium.Text: <title>1. Exclusive battles.</title><text>A premium subscription opens access to extended battle functionality. The exception is personal challenges and battles with friends, which remain free.</text><title>2. Premium chat.</title><text>A special chat for premium users provides the opportunity to exchange experiences and support in a closed community. An exclusive opportunity to communicate with the founders of the project.</text><title>3. Achievement certificates.</title><text>Certificates will be available only to premium subscribers. Without a subscription, each certificate will cost $2, and the feature is currently in development.</text><title>4. Free profile changes.</title><text>Premium users can update their profile avatar or set a nickname without being charged.</text>

Airdrop.Title: Airdrop
Airdrop.Text: <text>Each Slim accumulated on the bonus account becomes your ticket to participate. The more Slims on the account, the more significant your participation in the airdrop. The native SlimandRich token was created to share the project's success with its users, and 10% of the team's income is directed to support the token, ensure liquidity and develop staking.</text>

InviteFriends.Title: Invite friends
InviteFriends.Hint: Get 1000 slims to your bonus account for inviting a friend

TournamentGridWidget.Title: With your group
TournamentGridWidget.YouBet: Your bet on the battle: {amount} slims
TournamentGridWidget.Hint: The battle will start automatically on Monday, if you don't want to wait - click the button
TournamentGridWidget.SuccessAccept: You have accepted the battle, wait until the player starts the battle or on Monday the battle will start automatically

OneOnOneWithFriendWidget.Title: 1 on 1 with friends
OneOnOneWithFriendWidget.Bet: Your bet on the battle: {amount} slims

bymyself.Title: By myself
bymyself.Hint: Single weight loss challenge. You choose how much weight you want to lose, how much money you are willing to bet and how long you want to lose weight. If the desired parameters do not exceed the norm, then the bet is made. The challenge lasts as long as you chose.

onevsfriend.Title: 1 on 1 with friends
onevsfriend.Hint: Paired challenge. You can choose to create a battle and invite a friend or join an already created battle. When creating a battle, you choose the amount you want to bet on, when joining a created battle, this is a fixed parameter that your friend chose. How much weight you need to lose is calculated based on your parameters. The challenge lasts 2 weeks. Winners are determined every week.

onevsone.Title: 1 on 1
onevsone.Hint: Paired challenge. You choose the amount you want to bet on. How much weight you need to lose is calculated based on your parameters. The challenge lasts 2 weeks. We select an opponent with suitable parameters for a fair dispute. Winners are determined every week.

withyourgroup.Title: With your group
withyourgroup.Hint: Group challenge. You can choose to create a battle and invite friends or join an already created battle. When creating a battle, you choose the amount you want to bet on, when joining a created battle, this is a fixed parameter that your friend chose. How much weight you need to lose is calculated based on your parameters. The challenge lasts 2 weeks. Winners are determined every week.

groupfortime.Title: Group for time
groupfortime.Hint: Group challenge. You choose the amount you want to bet. How much to throw in is calculated based on your parameters. Opponents are selected according to the selected parameters. The challenge lasts 4 weeks. Winners are determined every week

groupbyweight.Title: Group by weight
groupbyweight.Hint: You choose the weight you want to lose in 1 week. You choose the amount you want to bet on. Opponents are selected according to the selected parameters. The challenge lasts 1 week.

JoinBattle.TitleFriend: Join a friend in a battle
JoinBattle.SubTitle: Here you can see all available battles and your statistics on them

BattlePage.Title: All battles
BattlePage.Subtitle: Here you can see all available battles!

GetMoneyPage.Subtitle: Get money information
GetMoneyPage.Content: 1. Log your weight dailyLog your weight every day in a row and earn 10 to 70 bonus Slims daily, starting from day one.2. Join battles every weekJoin at least one paid battle every week, and earn 1,000 to 10,000 bonus Slims, depending on your consistency.3. Invite a friendWhen your friend signs up and gets active, you’ll get 1,000 bonus Slims .4. Earn from referralsYou’ll also get 25% of all bonus Slims your invited friends earn.5. Upload food photosEvery time you upload a photo of your meal, you get 10 bonus Slims.6. Share your lifestylePost photos of your healthy (or not-so-healthy!) life, and earn 10 bonus Slims each time.

1.Title: 1. Which battles are free to join?
1.content: You can join 1-on-1 battles with your friends for free.

2.Title: 2. When do battles start?
2.content: Solo battles start the next day. Duo battles begin the day after your team is formed. Group battles always start on Mondays.

3.Title: 3. Which battles can I join without Premium?
3.content: Without Premium, you can join battles against yourself or a friend.

4.Title: 4. How can I earn money here?
4.content:
Stay active in the app:
  • Join battles regularly
  • Log your weight daily
  • Invite friends and earn referral bonuses
  • Win group battles
But the biggest reward? A healthier body and mind as you lose weight

5.Title: 5. How can I get free Slims?
5.content:
Be active!
  • Join weekly battles
  • Log your weight every day
  • Post photos of your meals
  • Share your health journey on SlimandRich
Invite friends and get 25% of their lost Slims as a bonus.

6.Title: 6. What are Slims?
6.content:
Slims are our in-app currency. You can use them to:
  • Get Premium
  • Join battles
  • Collect winnings
  • Support charity
  • Reward other users

7.Title: 7. How are results verified?
7.content: We trust our community. The best reward is real weight loss. But in group battles, users can help verify each other's results.

8.Title: 8. Why should I buy Slims?
8.content:
To:
  • Join earning-focused battles
  • Access Premium features
  • Reward others for their progress

9.Title: 9. What am I paying for?
9.content: We provide powerful motivation to lose weight—alone or with others. And yes, you can earn real money by winning battles

10.Title: 10. Are there any restrictions?
10.content:
Yes.
  • Don't join battles if your BMI is under 18.5
  • You must be 18 or older to participate

11.Title: 11. When should I upload results?
11.content: Every day!We recommend doing it each morning for best tracking.

12.Title: 12. What’s the bonus balance for?
12.content: Your bonus balance can be used for anything in the app—except battles. In the future, we plan to launch a crypto token. Your bonus balance will affect your airdrop size. Earn bonuses by staying active and inviting friends.

13.Title: 13. How do I cash out Slims?
13.content: Go to the Exchange tab in the app and choose your preferred payout method.

14.Title: 14. How do I invite friends to my battles?
14.content: Send them your battle’s unique invite code—they’ll be able to join directly.
